history.proof: qauto use: symetrique, transitive, abba, angle_nul, non_zero_pi.

ctx: intros A B C O1 O2 O3 I H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros A B C O1 O2 O3 I H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros A B C O1 O2 O3 I H1 H2 H3. split. - unfold double. rewrite (isocele_hauteur_bissectrice I A B C) by apply H1. rewrite (isocele_hauteur_bissectrice I A C B) by apply H2. rewrite (isocele_hauteur_bissectrice I B C A) by apply H3. reflexivity. - split. + unfold double. rewrite (isocele_hauteur_bissectrice I A C B) by apply H2. rewrite (isocele_hauteur_bissectrice I B C A) by apply H3. reflexivity. + unfold double. rewrite (isocele_hauteur_bissectrice I A B C) by apply H1. rewrite (isocele_hauteur_bissectrice I B C A) by apply H3. reflexivity.
